name: Easy Venison Meatloaf
author: MOTHERHEN1982
summary: Serve with potatoes and seasonal vegetables.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package dry stuffing mix (such as Stove Top®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Mix venison, stuffing mix, water, onion, 1/4 cup barbeque sauce, eggs, salt, and black pepper together in a large bowl until fully incorporated
Shape venison mixture into a loaf and place in a 9x13-inch baking dish
Spread 1/4 cup barbeque sauce over the top of loaf
Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 1 hour
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
